text: Snctm is an American nightclub and sex club based in Beverly Hills, California. It was founded by Damon Lawner. It has been called the world's most exclusive sex club. Male attendees are required to wear tuxedos and female attendees wear lingerie or cocktail dresses and only allowed to attend by submitting head shots for approval. Snctm has hosted private sex parties in Kiev, Miami, the Hamptons, and Moscow. Snctm's sex parties in the United States have been attended by such celebrities as comedian Bill Maher and actor Gwyneth Paltrow. The club was the subject of the Showtime unscripted docuseries Naked SNCTM. In August 2019 the club was sold to an anonymous investment group that refers to itself as the Circle. Snctm had originally closed due to the COVID-19 pandemic, but reopened at more limited capacity and with increased safety measures. The club is hosting a Black Death-themed Halloween party in New York amidst the pandemic.IB Times - "Upscale Sex Club Snctm Plans A Black Death-Themed Halloween Party Amid COVID-19 Pandemic" ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Nightclubs Category:Group sex Category:Nightclubs in California Category:Swinging (sexual practice)
title: Snctm (club)
